originalText.text: Aicha did an excellent job on my hair, I got knotless braids with a color. She took her time and made sure each part was neat and both side were even exactly what I look for in a hair braider. The salon was nice and clean. It took 5 hours to complete which is a plus. I would definitely go back again. Great job!

originalText.text:
I found out about Aicha hair braiding from tik tok . I drove from Jersey to Harlem and let me tell you ,The hr plus drive was very worth it . A young lady by the name of Vanessa did my hair . I asked for small blonde knotless braids . They let me pick out the colors I want .. they provide the hair . And I sat in the chair from 10-4:30 . My hair came out amazing !! Best knotless I‚Äôve had yet . I really love my hair . Vanessa was very patient and sweet . I made sure to tip her . I will definitely be back !!! Prices to me were very reasonable.

Thank you again ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèΩ

originalText.text: I've been going to Aicha for 7+ years.  Yesterday, I had a not so go experience 09/03/2023. I was asked how much I usually pay. I said $160.00, then my hair braided said to me well today it's $180.00. I believe it was Nadia who told her to tell me $180.00. I didn't say anything cause I wanted to get confirmation from my sister cause maybe I was mistaken.  We were just there in July of 2023. My sister confirmed that it was only $160.00. I noticed Aicha wasn't there, so I was thinking oh now they are just making up their own prices. Reluctantly, I paid 180.00. But they just lost a valuable customer. I understand French, and they were charging 200.00 for just knotless on some other people. I was like. I'm definitely not coming going back. I drive all the way from Long Island to Harlem to get robbed. I'm good. Thanks, but no thanks.

originalText.text: I've Been Looking For A New Braiding Spot For Awhile. I Came Across This Place From Tiktok &' Decided To Go Get My Hair Done &' Service Was As I'd Hoped. The Minute I Walked In, I Was Greeted By One Of The Braiders ( Namichata ) . She Was Doing Someones Hair And Asked Me To Have A Seat, That She Would Take Me. I Waited Less Than 10 Minutes. She Sanitized The Seat Before I Sat In It. I Got Waist Length Bohemian Knotless Braids In Green And Black. She Did Such A Good Job And She Braids Very Fast. I Was In Her Chair For About 4 Hours Or Less. She Had Finished My Hair So Fast That Some Of The Ladies Who Started Getting Their Hair Braided Before Me Were Still In Their Seats. My Hair Is Neat, Tight And Came Out Exactly How I'd Imagined. Definitely Making This My Spot

originalText.text: Sooo excited that I found my lady who had braided my hair for years! She‚Äôs in a new location and I really like it here! She was able to talk me as a walk in, pretty late and didn‚Äôt rush me at all. My service was a 10/10! Everyone was polite, welcoming and I was even told when a style was more suitable than another based on my hair which I love; because after all, everything isn‚Äôt for everyone. The location is perfect! I found on the street parking almost right away on a Saturday evening! Not overly crowded, bathroom was clean and the shop was in great condition! I‚Äôll definitely be back to be serviced again!
